description: The function has a potential Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability when it tries to access properties of obj1 or obj2 without checking if these objects are null. This can lead to a runtime error if either obj1 or obj2 is null. Additionally, the function has an uncontrolled recursion vulnerability. The function calls itself recursively without a proper base case, which can lead to a stack overflow error if the input objects have a circular reference or a deeply nested structure.
